name: War Angel
description:
Inspired by "This War of Mine", War Angel is a point and click adventure game where you control a volunteer medic named Laurie in a war zone. Your objective is to try to keep the sanity of the few who are there and heal those who are injured while everyone is sheltering in a church.

The game takes place in a church that was used as a refuge by civilians at the beginning of the war, original soundtrack by 

Corey Farr ( Between the Rains ) and additional narrative support by "Undragoncolorao".

Approximately 10-20 minutes of gameplay

No controller support for the time being.

English language only
